channel.title: SHRIVATHS S NAIR
channel.description: Recent content on SHRIVATHS S NAIR

item.title: How Did I Hugo?
item.description: Creating a Hugo server was easy. I followed the website’s procedure. Adding a post was straightforward too. For the themes part, I scrolled through the Hugo themes page but didn’t find what I was looking for. Then, I found a simple yet pretty theme, Hugo-ink, and git-cloned its theme repository. I made all the changes to suit my needs, like fonts, colors, icons, etc. Hosting was a bit challenging because I initially tried a workflow method from the Hugo Git page, and it didn’t work.

item.title: Myself
item.description: Hey there, I’m Shrivaths S Nair, and I call the town of Palakkad in Kerala my home. I’m a college student, currently studying Computer Science Engineering. One of my greatest joys in life is diving into the world of books, and my all-time favorite is “Who Moved My Cheese.” When I’m not buried in code or books, you’ll likely find me outdoors, playing games with friends. Coding is not just a subject for me, it’s a passion I love to explore.
